Name: Metaphobia
About the game: Metaphobia is a Point & Click investigative adventure game. Shortly after being elected mayor, Carl Elmstat is murdered by a thief who is quickly caught, convicted, and sent to prison – case closed. Carl’s son Richard however, is unsettled by the details and decides to investigate further on his own. His prime suspect? His father’s political rival– Edward Raban. Throughout the investigation, Richard will find out that the truth behind the murder is hidden deep under the ground – deeper than he ever could have imagined. FEATURES: Greenscreen Rotoscoped Animations and Retro Graphics Over 30 locations and 20 characters Full Length Soundtrack Full voice-acted story
